message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a good deal if you accept now!
You said it was a fair split, but I'm not convinced. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more this round. Take it or leave it!
You're being a bit greedy, Alice. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a fair deal.
